channel.title: MIX Fold 4 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: MIX Fold 4 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UNVCNXM Fastboot update for MIX Fold 4 China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: MIX Fold 4 China

Codename: goku

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UNVCNXM | 14.0

Size: 9.1 GB

MD5: c4afed92e53cc1e41d7147ad84bc0f1c

Changelog:
[System]
Updated the security patch to July 2024. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
New: New Split screen interactions support seamless and intuitive switching between split and fullscreen view
[Widgets]
New: Travel assistant can notify you about your flights and train
[Proactive intelligence]
New: With the latest version of Mi AI, your device can recognize items in images and solve math problems, erase objects, expand photos, change backgrounds, and add effects
New: With the latest version of Mi AI, AI summary supports Word and PDF documents up to 15 MB
New: With the latest version of Mi AI and Gallery, you can select items, add text prompts, and generate videos using AI
New: With AI, Notes support capabilities such as AI summary, smart layouts, error correction, and translation now
New: AI provides simultaneous interpretation during calls and online meetings between Chinese, English, French, German, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, and Spanish.
[Camera]
Optimization: Camera stability and responsiveness
Optimization: Zoom
Optimization: Beautify and Portrait mode
[Gallery]
New: Select items from your Gallery and create videos using AI
New: You can use AI images generated from photos to create portraits

Download: Here
